options.optionText: Calm down, I'm with no gang.
options.responseText: Yeah, right. Heard that before. If you're here for caps, tell your boss we're still scraping them together. Unless you've come for somethin' else...

followUpOptions.optionText: Actually, I want to help. How many caps do you need?
followUpOptions.responseText: Help? Seriously? We need at least 80 caps more... If we don't pay up, they'll drag me off and probably slit Gramps' throat just to teach the kid a lesson.

followUpOptions.optionText: [Give 80 caps] Here's what you need. Stay safe.
followUpOptions.responseText: Damn... You're really just givin' this up? No strings attached? Guess some people out here haven't lost everything yet.

followUpOptions.optionText: [Give 150 caps] Take extra—get yourself and the others something to eat too.
followUpOptions.responseText: Wait, seriously? That's... damn, that's more than we even hoped for. I don’t know what to say. Thank you. Really. Maybe there’s still some good left out here.

followUpOptions.optionText: Actually, maybe there’s something you can do for me first.
followUpOptions.responseText: Knew it. No one gives caps without wantin' somethin'. What exactly you got in mind?
Fuck you. Fine. Take a look, asshole—ain't nothing special.

followUpOptions.optionText: Here. Take the caps. We're done.
followUpOptions.responseText: Caps for tits, huh? Fuckin' classy. Just go before I vomit.

followUpOptions.optionText: Changed my mind. You're not worth it.
followUpOptions.responseText: Figures. Now piss off before I decide your ugly face needs buckshot.

followUpOptions.optionText: Do you have any fap material? Like pre-war porn mags?
followUpOptions.responseText: What the actual fuck... Yeah, got some old smut Gramps kept. Trade you the lot for those caps.
Whatever floats your boat, freak. Pleasure doin' business.

followUpOptions.optionText: Forget it. Keep your crusty porn.
followUpOptions.responseText: Your loss. Guess it's back to jerkin' off with your imagination, creep.

followUpOptions.optionText: 80 caps? What's stopping me from just taking yours right now?
followUpOptions.responseText: Nothing but my dignity and a shotgun hidden behind the door. You wanna find out if I’m bluffing?

followUpOptions.optionText: Put the gun down, I'm taking your caps—easy way or hard.
followUpOptions.responseText: Fine, asshole. Take them. But I swear, when the Gutters come for me, I'll make sure they know your ugly face too.

followUpOptions.optionText: Easy. Just testing you. Keep your caps.
followUpOptions.responseText: Real funny. Humor's wasted around here. You done?

options.optionText: I'm with the Gutters. Hand over the caps or things get ugly.
options.responseText: You're early, bastard. Fine. We've only got 100. Take it and get out.

followUpOptions.optionText: [Take caps] I'll take everything you've got. Hand it over.
followUpOptions.responseText: You heartless piece of shit. Take them then. But just know, if I survive tonight, I'll hunt you down myself.

followUpOptions.optionText: Keep your caps. I was testing your loyalty.
followUpOptions.responseText: Loyalty? To you psychos? Just leave. Please.

options.optionText: You seem tough. Why haven't you fought the raiders?
options.responseText: Tough? Look around you. Gramps can barely lift himself, Sammy's just a kid, and I'm one bullet from leavin' them alone. You offering to fight alongside us, or just talkin' shit?

followUpOptions.optionText: Forget I asked. Good luck out here.
followUpOptions.responseText: Yeah, that's what I thought. Walk away like everyone else does.

options.responseText: You a shrink now? Alright, here's the short version: farm burned, Mom dead, raiders at the door, and I’m trying to keep the kid from eating dirt. Good enough for ya?
Don't get yourself killed out there—or do, I couldn't care less anymore.

auto_lines: Stop right there. You with the Gutters? Say one wrong thing and I put a bullet through your eye.
